src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] RP : Can you ask if there is a cafeteria ? Because I 'd really like a coffee before the consultation . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Yes . [MASK] LC : Um hello , could you tell me the address um where the cafeteria is ? Because my friend would like to get something . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] [MASK] RP : I really need to go to the toilet before going to the consultation . Can you ask where the toilet is please ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : I 'm going to speak for my friend . My friend would like to go to the toilet before her consultation . Can you tell me where it is ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . [MASK] [MASK] RP : To go and see the person I told you about , I do n't know exactly where it is or which department it 's in , but it 's room 17 . Can he tell us a bit more about where this room 17 is ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : Um , do you know where room 17 is ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift , and it 's on the second floor . [MASK] [MASK] [end] LC : Thank you . # thank ( ) @ CG ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) RP : We have an appointment at 5 PM in cardiology , ask if there are any delays to the appointment . LC : Do you know if there are any delays in the cardiology department ? My friend has an appointment at 5 PM . ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . # cant-help ( ) ; suggest ( going-to ( reception ) ) LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) RP : We have an appointment at 5 PM but I 'm not sure in which department . It 's with doctor something . # request ( appt ( place ) ) @ G ( RP , get-info ( appt ( place ) ) ) LC : That 's not accurate . src: LP : Hello ARI . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LP : Ask how ... # incomplete-da ( ) RC : Hello . I 'd like to have a small meal , can you tell me where we should go ? # greet ( ) ; request ( food ) @ G ( RC , eat ( ) ) ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . # inform ( food ) @ AG ( RC , eat ( ) ) RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? # request ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . # inform ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? # r-confirm ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) @ G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) ARI : Yes , you 're right . # p-confirm ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) @ CG ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . # offer-help ( ) [start] RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? Because my friend is in a wheelchair and he ca n't get around by himself . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Hmm , ARI , could you tell me how to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] RC : ARI , could you tell me if my appointment is at 11 AM ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : He might know how to get there . LP : Can you tell me how to get to the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Ah , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] LP : It 's quite simple . Thank you ARI . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] LP : It would be nice if we knew how to take the lift . LP : ARI , could you tell us how to get to the lift ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Do these lifts take us to the cafeteria , or do we have to take something else ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Is the cafeteria on the ground floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] [end] RC : So we do n't have to take the lift to get to the cafeteria ? ARI : No , you do not . # disaffirm ( ) RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) LP : Thank you very much ARI . # thank ( ) ARI : You 're welcome , thank you , see you later and have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

[MASK] [MASK] ARI : No . Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Is the coffee from a vending machine or a cafeteria ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : Go ahead . src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] RP : Hello ARI , we have to find a lift to get to the next floor . Where is the lift in this building ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [MASK] [end] RP : Ok , and we have time to have a coffee before going upstairs , is that right ? # acknowledge ( ) ; request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . # affirm ( ) RP : Wait , so we 'll go to the cafeteria before taking the lift .
